tags.name: cwc-test-dropdown
tags.description: Dropdown, example test component. Do not use in production.
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * Dropdown, example test component. Do not use in production.
 *
 * @noInheritDoc
 * @element cwc-test-dropdown
 * @slot default - Content slot for dropdown content
 * @attr outline - Apply outline style.
 * @event openChange - notify open state change of dropdown
 * @cssprop --clr-test-border-color
 * @cssprop --clr-test-button-background-color
 * @cssprop --clr-test-button-text-color
 */

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Set open to open or close the dropdown
attributes.jsDoc: /** Set open to open or close the dropdown */

properties.name: open
properties.description: Set open to open or close the dropdown
properties.jsDoc: /** Set open to open or close the dropdown */

events.name: openChange
events.description: notify open state change of dropdown
